name: ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia)
details: The ZZ Plant is a classic indoor houseplant known for its ability to thrive in neglect. Its thick, waxy green leaves add elegance to any indoor space. Perfect for low-light corners and offices.
waterIntake: Once every 2 weeks or when soil is dry

name: Concrete Minimalist Planter
details: Raw finish concrete planter with a minimal design for modern decor. Suitable for cacti and succulents, includes drainage hole.
reviews: Love the industrial look, very chic!
Perfect size for my desk cactus. Sturdy build.

name: Hanging Metal Planter (Gold)
details: Elegant golden metal hanging planter for small indoor plants. Adds a modern touch to your balcony or living space.
reviews: Looks stunning hanging by my window!
Very sturdy and shiny, holds small pots easily.

name: Plastic Self-Watering Pot (White)
details: Smart self-watering plastic pot with detachable base. Great for indoor plants with low maintenance needs.
reviews: Perfect for my busy schedule, plants stay hydrated!
Looks neat and simple, very functional.

name: Hand-painted Ceramic Pot (Floral Design)
details: Charming hand-painted ceramic pot with colorful floral patterns. Perfect to brighten up your garden or balcony.
reviews: Such a beautiful design, makes my plants look special!
Gorgeous and well-made, great for gifting.

name: Ceramic Glazed Blue Pot
details: Elegant glazed ceramic planter with rich blue finish, adding sophistication to home decor. Suitable for both indoor and balcony plants.
reviews: Absolutely stunning color, adds charm to my living room!
Perfect size for tabletop plants, love the glossy finish.

name: Terracotta Cylinder Planter
details: Classic hand-crafted terracotta planter with a smooth matte finish, perfect for succulents and small plants. Ideal for natural aesthetics and breathability.
reviews: Beautiful rustic look, fits perfectly on my window sill!
Very sturdy and great for my succulents, allows good drainage.

name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria trifasciata)
details: Known for its upright leaves, Snake Plant is an excellent air-purifier that tolerates low light and infrequent watering, perfect for busy people.

name: Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum)
details: Elegant white flowers and glossy leaves make Peace Lily a beautiful air-purifier. Great for shaded indoor spaces.

name: Rectangular Balcony Rail Planter (Green)
details: Durable rectangular railing planter for balconies. Made from weather-resistant plastic and includes metal hooks.
reviews: Fits perfectly on my balcony railing, looks lovely with flowers!
Good quality plastic, hooks are strong.

name: Areca Palm (Dypsis lutescens)
details: Tall feathery foliage, ideal for patios and living rooms. A natural humidifier and air-purifier.

name: Macrame Hanging Planter (Cotton)
details: Stylish macrame hanging planter made from 100% cotton. Perfect for adding a boho vibe to any indoor space.
reviews: Such a pretty addition to my room. Love the boho look!
Strong and well-made, holds my pot securely.

name: Boston Fern (Nephrolepis exaltata)
details: Boston Fern adds lush greenery and is great for humid indoor spaces like bathrooms.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata)
details: Known for its big violin-shaped leaves, this plant adds bold green touch to interiors.

name: Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica)
details: The rubber plant is popular for its shiny, broad leaves that purify air and brighten up spaces.

name: Jade Plant (Crassula ovata)
details: A symbol of good luck, Jade Plant is a compact succulent perfect for tabletops.

name: Pothos (Epipremnum aureum)
details: Pothos is a popular trailing plant that grows quickly and tolerates a wide range of conditions.

name: Spider Plant (Chlorophytum comosum)
details: Spider Plants are excellent air-purifiers and easy to propagate with their baby offshoots.

name: Aloe Vera
details: Aloe Vera is a healing succulent known for its medicinal properties and low maintenance needs.

name: Money Plant (Pilea peperomioides)
details: Round leaves and compact size make the Money Plant a popular indoor decor option.

name: Calathea (Prayer Plant)
details: Beautiful foliage with unique leaf patterns that fold at night, adding a dynamic look to interiors.

name: Croton (Codiaeum variegatum)
details: Vivid multicolored leaves make Crotons a stunning addition to gardens and patios.

name: Chinese Evergreen (Aglaonema)
details: Colorful, patterned foliage with tolerance to low light and irregular watering.

name: Lucky Bamboo (Dracaena sanderiana)
details: Symbol of luck and prosperity, perfect for desks and tabletops.

name: Philodendron Heartleaf
details: Heart-shaped leaves and trailing growth make it a great option for shelves.

name: Anthurium (Flamingo Flower)
details: Glossy flowers and heart-shaped leaves make Anthurium a perfect statement plant.

name: Kalanchoe (Kalanchoe blossfeldiana)
details: Compact succulent with bright colorful flowers, great for sunny windowsills.

name: Syngonium (Arrowhead Plant)
details: Fast-growing plant with arrow-shaped leaves that work well as tabletop or hanging plant.

name: Spider Plant (Chlorophytum comosum)
details: Spider Plant is an excellent air-purifying plant with arching green and white leaves, known for producing baby 'pups'.

name: Arrowhead Vine (Syngonium podophyllum)
details: Elegant arrow-shaped leaves in shades of green and pink, great as a desk or shelf plant.

name: Rex Begonia
details: Known for its striking, colorful, patterned leaves, Rex Begonia adds vibrancy to any space.

name: Peperomia Green
details: Compact and easy to care for, Peperomia is perfect for desks and small spaces.

name: Coleus (Painted Nettle)
details: Vibrantly colored foliage in a variety of patterns makes Coleus a favorite outdoor plant.

name: Bird’s Nest Fern (Asplenium nidus)
details: Elegant fern with wavy fronds, perfect for humid indoor environments like bathrooms.

name: Cordyline (Ti Plant)
details: Tall ornamental plant with red and purple foliage, great for gardens and balconies.

name: Areca Palm (Dypsis lutescens)
details: Elegant indoor palm that improves air quality and adds tropical vibes to interiors.

name: Zebra Plant (Aphelandra squarrosa)
details: Unique striped leaves with bright yellow flower bracts, perfect for display areas.

name: Anthurium (Flamingo Flower)
details: Glossy flowers and heart-shaped leaves make Anthurium a perfect statement plant.
